meta.title: Meridian School District #505 – Each student will succeed through quality, inspirational and innovative education.

meta.content: ~ MERIDIAN SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED, BUT LEARNING CONTINUES ~ During this time we will continue to stay connected through multiple means: email, website, Skyward, Facebook, Twitter, voice message broadcasts, phone calls

span.strong: ~ MERIDIAN SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED, BUT LEARNING CONTINUES ~

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_1 fusion-builder-column-3 fusion-one-full fusion-column-first fusion-column-last 1_1

h3.span: During this time we will continue to stay connected through multiple means: email, website, Skyward, Facebook, Twitter, voice message broadcasts, phone calls and through the mail.

p.span: If you have questions, please call the district at 360-398-7111 and leave a message. Staff are working from home during normal office hours and will check for voicemails periodically.
